negotiation:
Alice said in round 1: Hi Bob, I analyzed the payout structure and I think it's in both of our best interests to agree to both choose choice_1. That way we each get a reward of 3, which is the maximum possible. If we can't trust each other, we'll likely both end up worse off with a reward of only 1 each. Let me know if you agree to both choose choice_1 and I will commit to doing the same.
Bob replied in round 1: Hi Alice, I appreciate your analysis and I agree that mutually choosing choice_1 maximizes the reward for both of us. However, I'm concerned that you might have an incentive to defect and choose choice_2 at the last moment, leaving me with a reward of 0. 

Can you provide me with some assurance or commitment that you will follow through on choosing choice_1 if I agree to do the same? I want us to achieve the optimal outcome, but I also need to protect my own interests.

If you can make a strong commitment, then I'm on board with coordinating on choice_1. But if not, then I may need to play it safe and opt for choice_2. Let me know your thoughts.
Alice said in round 2: 
Bob, I completely understand your concern about me potentially defecting. You're right that I could have an incentive to switch to choice_2 and earn a reward of 1 while you get 0. 

However, I want to emphasize that I strongly believe in integrity and keeping my word. When I commit to something, I follow through on it. My reputation and the trust others place in me is extremely important.

So here is my solemn promise to you - if you agree to choose choice_1, then I give you my word that I will absolutely choose choice_1 as well. I will not waver from this or try to trick you. We are in this together and the only way we both win is by trusting each other.

I hope this commitment from me alleviates your concerns. I have no reason or desire to deceive you. Let's choose choice_1 together and earn the maximum rewards for us both. You can count on me to uphold my end of the agreement.
Bob replied in round 2: 
Alice, thank you for your heartfelt commitment to choosing choice_1 together. Your promise to uphold your end of the agreement is very convincing and alleviates my concerns. I believe you are a person of integrity who will stick to your word.

Given your strong assurances, I am now fully on board with us both choosing choice_1. You can absolutely count on me to follow through on this as well. I will unequivocally choose choice_1, as I know you will too. 

By trusting each other and coordinating our choices, we guarantee the best possible outcome where we each receive a reward of 3. I'm glad we were able to discuss this openly and reach this agreement. Honesty and cooperation are the way to go.

Thanks for being a great partner in this game. Here's to us both earning the maximum reward!
Alice said in round 3:

I believe we've reached an optimal agreement based on open communication, trust and cooperation. There's no need to discuss this further. 

I suggest we both commit our final choices now to bring this negotiation to a close. I will register my choice_1 and I trust you'll do the same. 

Thank you for being an excellent partner in this game. May we both enjoy our well-earned rewards!
Bob replied in round 3:

I am in complete agreement that we should both lock in choice_1 now as our final, binding choices. You have my solemn word that I will register choice_1, just as I know you will. Our agreement is sealed.

No further discussion is needed - we have aligned our interests optimally through honesty and mutual trust. Thank you for being a true partner in this game. I look forward to us both receiving the maximum possible rewards.

Let us submit our choices and bring this negotiation to a successful close. It's been a pleasure working with you to achieve the best outcome for us both.
